verbose_text: The correlations between the cell surface expression of connexins (Cx32, Cx37, Cx43, Cx45) and the myeloid differentiation markers, CD11c, CD13, CD14, CD15 and CD33, as well as the stem cell marker, CD34, were then analysed (XREF_TABLE).
evidence: expression of connexins (Cx32, Cx37, Cx43, Cx45) and the myeloid differentiation markers, CD11c
